name: LAPTOP COMPUTER LECTERN/PODIUM - SOLD OUT Write us for arrival date
description: The newest product in our line is a great LAPTOP LECTERN allowing the user to use his/her laptop while standing up.   Black Stand is ideal for lecturing, teaching, working, etc.  with your laptop at eye level.  Turns any location, indoors or out,  into your office!  Stand weight only 11 lbs and fully adjustable.  Can be effectively used by persons in the height range of  6'4" to 4'11".  Strong, sturdy, sharp looking stand is just what the person who uses a laptop computer on the go needs.  Slide out mouse tray for mouse users.  Adjustable stand supports do NOT interfere with any of the laptop's i/o functions.  Limited stock available.  Get yours while we have this item in stock to ship!

name: WHITE PODIUM & CASE
description:
Our biggest seller!  Lightweight, Good Looking, Easy to carry, and The best unit of its kind on the market today.  INCLUDES Free Case!
$15 Flat Rate USPS Shipping anywhere in the 48 states USA. In Alaska or Hawaii please write us for exact quote. Thank-you!

INTERNATIONAL:  We discourage international shipping due to the fact it costs more to ship than the actual product is worth. For customers with a Fed Ex account we will, as a courtesy, drop off your lectern at our local Fed Ex/Kinkos store and you can deal directly with them for shipping. Please note that we will only charge the exact amount of your lectern purchase from us ($59.95) and all shipping related matters are between you and the shipper and do not involve us. Please keep in mind duties and taxes and tarriffs levied by many countries which further inflate the cost of international shipping.
